properties.areaDesc: Monroe, MS; Itawamba, MS; Lee, MS
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 7:40AM CST until January 11 at 8:30AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi...
Southeastern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi...
Northern Monroe County in northeastern Mississippi...

* Until 830 AM CST.

* At 740 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Evergreen, or
near Amory, moving east at 50 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Amory, Fulton, Smithville, Tremont, New Salem, New Wren, Evergreen,
Hatley, Gattman, Abney, Quincy, Turon, Wise Gap, Wren, Sipsey Fork,
Becker, Cardsville, Tilden, Splunge and Athens.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CST for northeastern
Mississippi.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to
flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
